SEARCH
Module it.am04softeng.codexnaturalis
Package Server.Controller

Interface ServerState

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChooseSecretAchievementState, ChooseStartingCardState, DrawCardState, LeaderboardState, LoadGameLobbyState, LobbyState, PlaceCardState
public interface ServerState
This interface is used to handle the state of the server. Each class implementing this interface will handle a different state of the server

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(String name, String clientID) throws AlreadyStartedException, TooManyPlayersException, IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a player to the game
      Parameters:
      name - the player name
      clientID - the id of the client who's playing as the player
      Throws:
      TooManyPlayersException - if the player limit has already been reached
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is already taken
      AlreadyStartedException - if the game has already started

    • addSavedPlayer

      void addSavedPlayer(String clientId, String name) throws AlreadyStartedException, IllegalArgumentException, PlayerNotFoundByNameException
      Connects a player to a loaded game
      Parameters:
      clientId - the id of the client who is connecting
      name - the name of the player
      Throws:
      AlreadyStartedException - if the game has already started
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player is already connected
      PlayerNotFoundByNameException - if there is no player with that name

    • removePlayer

      void removePlayer(Player player)
      removes a player from the list of players
      Parameters:
      player - the player

    • playCard

      void playCard(Player player, int position, int xCoord, int yCoord, CornerCardFace face) throws TooFewElementsException
      play a card from the hand to the manuscript
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      position - the card position in the hand
      xCoord - the x coordinate
      yCoord - the y coordinate
      face - the face choosen by the player
      Throws:
      TooFewElementsException - if the player has already placed a card during the turn

    • drawCard

      void drawCard(Player player, DeckPosition deckPosition, Decks deck) throws TooManyElementsException, AlreadyFinishedException
      draw a card from one of the decks
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      deckPosition - where i want to draw the card from
      deck - the deck
      Throws:
      TooManyElementsException - if the player hasn't yet placed a card during the turn
      AlreadyFinishedException - if the deck has no cards

    • reactToDisconnection

      void reactToDisconnection(String id)
      Reacts to the disconnection of a player, handling its possible removal from the game
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the player

    • reconnect

      void reconnect(String oldId, String newId, Player player, Map<Player,List<AchievementCard>> givenSecretObjectiveCards, Map<Player,StartingCard> givenStartingCards) throws AlreadyFinishedException, NotYetStartedException
      Reconnects a player to the game
      Parameters:
      oldId - the id of the client who is reconnecting
      newId - the id of the player the client is reconnecting as
      player - the player object of the player the client is reconnecting as
      givenSecretObjectiveCards - the secret objective cards given to each player
      givenStartingCards - the starting cards given to each player
      Throws:
      NotYetStartedException - if the game has not yet started
      AlreadyFinishedException - if the game is already finished

    • isInSavedGameLobby

      boolean isInSavedGameLobby()
      Checks if the server is in the saved game lobby
      Returns:
      true if the server is in the saved game lobby
